plot: A short comedy featuring a love triancle, a trailer park and Elvis's jumpsuit; its themes include letting go of the past, staying true to your love and the importance of doing laundry.
title: Trouble in Paradise
plot_es: A short comedy featuring a love triancle, a trailer park and Elvis's jumpsuit; its themes include letting go of the past, staying true to your love and the importance of doing laundry.
plot_en: A short comedy featuring a love triancle, a trailer park and Elvis's jumpsuit; its themes include letting go of the past, staying true to your love and the importance of doing laundry.
